CustomField.description: When set to true, disables the trigger that maintains unique skill names. When false, you can set a value for the UniqueNameAdditionalFields Skills configuration option to configure uniqueness constraints.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When set to true, disables the trigger that maintains unique skill names. When false, you can set a value for the UniqueNameAdditionalFields Skills configuration option to configure uniqueness constraints.
CustomField.label: Skill Unique Name Trigger Disabled
